insert into sp_apilog (id, req_ip, req_api, req_parame, req_token, user_id, admin_id, start_time) values (#{id}, #{reqIp}, #{reqApi}, #{reqParame}, #{reqToken}, #{userId}, #{adminId}, now(3))
